p: Tinospora crispa ( T. crispa) is a precious medicinal climbing plant. As a kind of vines, its body is very rough, light brown, long to 6â€“7 m or more ( Figure 10). It wildly grows in many South East Asia countries such as Laos, Cambodia, Thailand, and Philippines, etc., particularly common in the Northern areas in Vietnam [ 105, 106, 107].
